title: Face Recognition App
content: Using React.js, user authentication and NPM Bcrypt for password protection I created a face recognition app. Copy an image url that includes a face and test it out.

title: Clicky Game App
content: Created a memory game using React. This application breaks up the UI into components, manages component state, and respond to user events.

title: Mongo Scrape App
content: This app uses NPMs body-parser, cheerio, express, express-handlebars, mongoose and request to scrape news articles from the Chicago Tribune and displays them for users to save, take notes and delete. It uses mongoDB to store the data collected and is deployed through heroku. Handlebars and MVC paradigm were additional features.

title: Friend Finder App
content: Friend Finder application is meant to simulate a simple dating app. The application is implemented using a Node.js and Express server on the back end and the Materialize CSS framework on the front end. For more details visit my git repository and review the README.

title: BrewIary App
content: Part of a Northwestern University Boot Camp group project, we used Javascript, jQuery and APIs to create a brewery app to search beer and log notes. This app was designed as a beer diary, hence being called 'BrewIary'. Firebase was included for user authentication.

title: Eat Da Burger App
content: A full stack web app featuring the use of Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars for view generation and a ORM. Node and MySQL are used to query and route data flow in the app.

title: BG Color Generator
content: This background generator uses Node.js and JavaSript to create perfect color palettes. For more details visit my git repository and review the README.

title: Superhero Trivia
content: This superhero trivia game is based on jQuery and manipulation of the DOM. For more details visit my git repository and review the README.

title: Animal Giphy App
content: A full stack web app featuring the use of Node.js, Express.js, Handlebars for view generation and a ORM. Node and MySQL are used to query and route data flow in the app.

title: Liri Node App
content: LIRI is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. Use LIRI to get your latest tweets, find out about a song, or a movie, or just choose a random action from your own random file. Please visit my git repository and review the README.

title: Stahlwalker Blog
content: Jekyll is a parsing engine, bundled as a ruby gem, used to build static websites from dynamic components such as templates, partials, liquid code, markdown, etc. Jekyll is known as a simple static site generator. I used Jekyll to create my professional blog.

title: Bamazon App
content: Bamazon is a Command Line Interface (CLI) app that accepts orders from customers and depletes stock from the store's inventory. It runs on Node.js and MySQL. Please visit my git repository and review the README.

title: Github Repository
content: My Git Repository is a digital directory or storage space where you can access my projects, and all files that Git saves. A Readme file is usually a text file that explains a bit about the project.
